update.name: Phoca Download Content Plugin
update.description:
Phoca Download Content plugin is a Joomla! plugin which displays: - link to Phoca Download categories - link to Phoca Download files - files which can be previewed (e.g. PDF, images) - files which can be played (e.g. MP3, MP4, OGG, OGV) - YouTube videos
in article content.
